attributes.action: instruct the D.W.P to pay FULL pensions to anyone over Retirement Age wef April 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone retiring after beginning of April 2010 with only 30 years full N.I. contributions will receive a FULL pension from the State. People who have retired before this date with more than 30 years contributions but less than 40 years contributions receive a reduced State Pension e.g. 34 years = 84% and will remain on this reduction after April 2010.Where is the FAIR FOR ALL in this ??..
